New Records: Anthony Edwards knocked down six threes, marking the seventh time this season he has finished a game with 6+ made threes (26th career)... Tonight’s performance moved Edwards past Trae Young and D’Angelo Russell for the most career games with 6+ made threes by a player aged 23 or younger in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Minnesota Timberwolves erased a 19-point deficit to defeat the LA Clippers on Monday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was an impressive showing from Edwards, and more importantly a big win for Minnesota at home.
Others: Sweeping their season series with the Clippers, the Timberwolves now have that tiebreaker should it come into play.
